Class MainController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainController
public class MainController extends Object
The MainController class is part of MODEL. serves as the central hub for the application, managing navigation between modules: Pok√©mon, Moves, and Items. It initializes each controller and presents the main application menu.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MainController(View view)
    Constructs the MainController, initializing the sub-controllers or features and models.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    initItemsMenu()
    Displays the Item management menu and handles actions such as viewing and searching items.
    void
    initMenu()
    Displays the main menu, it allows a way to navigate between the other features such as Pokemon, Moves, Items, and a mean to exit the application.
    void
    initMovesMenu()
    Displays the Moves management menu and handles actions such as adding, viewing, searching, saving, and loading moves.
    void
    initPokemonMenu()
    Displays the Pokemon management menu and handles Pokemon related actions such as adding, viewing, searching, saving, and loading Pokemon entries.
    void
    initTrainerMenu()
    Placeholder for future Trainer management menu.
    void
    start()
    Starts the application by launching the main menu.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the application by launching the main menu.

    • initMenu

      public void initMenu()
      Displays the main menu, it allows a way to navigate between the other features such as Pokemon, Moves, Items, and a mean to exit the application.

    • initPokemonMenu

      public void initPokemonMenu()
      Displays the Pokemon management menu and handles Pokemon related actions such as adding, viewing, searching, saving, and loading Pokemon entries.

    • initMovesMenu

      public void initMovesMenu()
      Displays the Moves management menu and handles actions such as adding, viewing, searching, saving, and loading moves.

    • initItemsMenu

      public void initItemsMenu()
      Displays the Item management menu and handles actions such as viewing and searching items.
